FedMsg Status Table
===================

This is a table to keep track of where we are with all the different systems.
There is no information here about *receiving* messages, only sending.

+---------------+-----------+------------+----------+-----------+
| Service       | Dev       |    Stg     |  SSL     |   Prod    |
+===============+===========+============+==========+===========+
| fedmsg-relay  | DONE      |   DONE     | N/A      | DONE      |
+---------------+-----------+------------+----------+-----------+
